summary: A humorous colorscheme based on tomato soup and grilled cheese sandwiches!
name: tomatosoup.vim
description: Download this, look at it, go make some tomato soup and grilled cheese sandwiches and enjoy them.  Then when you are done eating, use a serious colorscheme.  You could possibly set some useful commands to change the colorscheme to tomatosoup.vim around lunch and dinner time.  :)  Have fun, and happy vimming!
install_details: Just put in your ~/.vim/colors/ directory and type ":color tomatosoup".
